channel.title: Backup on Martin Skøtt
channel.description: Recent content in Backup on Martin Skøtt

item.title: How I Restore Backups
item.description: My recent post about replacing my backup solution with BorgBackup ended with a bit of a cliffhanger… I still needed to try and restore some data from backup.

item.title: How I Do Backups
item.description: For the last six years I have been using a backup product called SpiderOak One which puts a large focus on privacy - it even got a recommendation from Edward Snowden.
